subject: RE: [junit] assertTrue(true)
msgSnippet: ... I don t think it s a good idea to assert against exception messages since your tests will be hard to port when you internationalize your application. At
messageBody:
> From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On
> Behalf Of Jason Rogers

> assertStringContains(e.getMessage(), <exceptionReason
> dealing with badParameter>);

I don't think it's a good idea to assert against exception messages since
your tests will be hard to port when you internationalize your application.
At the very least, make this dependent on a key and a bundle.
